titleStmt.title: A brief relation of the life and death of the late famous astrologer, Mr. Vincent Wing Together with his nativity, as it was done, many years before his death, by his own hand; and now, for general satisfaction, made publick. By J.G. philomathētikos.
titleStmt.author: Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.

notesStmt.note: The word "philomathētikos" on title page is printed in Greek characters.
Running title reads: The life and death of Mr. Vincent Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
